about.description:
The Computational Crystallography Toolbox (cctbx) is being developed
as the open source component of the Phenix system. The goal of the
Phenix project is to advance automation of macromolecular structure
determination. Phenix depends on the cctbx, but not vice versa. This
hierarchical approach enforces a clean design as a reusable library.
The cctbx is therefore also useful for small-molecule crystallography
and even general scientific applications.
about.license: BSD-3-Clause-LBNL AND BSD-3-Clause AND BSL-1.0 AND LGPL-2.0-only AND LGPL-2.1-only AND LGPL-3.0-only AND MIT AND LGPL-2.0-or-later WITH WxWindows-exception-3.1

index.name: cctbx

name: cctbx
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.22.0
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: cctbx
  version: '2022.9'
source:
  patches:
    - cbf.patch
    - dxtbx.patch
    - libann.patch
    - libtbx_SConscript.patch
    - libtbx_osx-arm64.patch
  sha256: c8b9d518bcbca9f9635ef1387d6dadd15629628cdd40cd4d116aef337db31f73
  url: https://github.com/cctbx/cctbx_project/releases/download/v2022.9/cctbx-2022.9.tar.gz
build:
  noarch: false
  noarch_python: false
  number: '0'
  preserve_egg_dir: true
  string: py310hd032262_0
requirements:
  host:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h4e0d66e_4
    - ca-certificates 2022.9.24 h1084571_0
    - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.36.1 ha35d02b_2
    - libffi 3.4.2 h4e0d66e_5
    - libgcc-ng 12.1.0 hba45bf4_16
    - libgomp 12.1.0 hba45bf4_16
    - libnsl 2.0.0 h4e0d66e_0
    - libsqlite 3.39.3 hcc10993_0
    - libuuid 2.32.1 h4e0d66e_1000
    - libzlib 1.2.12 hb283c62_3
    - ncurses 6.3 hab78ccb_1
    - openssl 3.0.5 hb283c62_2
    - python 3.10.6 h2c4edbf_0_cpython
    - readline 8.1.2 h6828edc_0
    - tk 8.6.12 h41c6715_0
    - tzdata 2022d h191b570_0
    - xz 5.2.6 hb283c62_0
  run:
    - cctbx-base >=2022.9,<2022.10.0a0
    - ipython
    - python >=3.10,<3.11.0a0
    - python_abi 3.10.* *_cp310
    - pyzmq
    - websockets
test:
  commands:
    - libtbx.show_commands
    - pip check
  imports:
    - gltbx.gl
    - gltbx.glu
    - scitbx.array_family.flex
  requires:
    - pip
about:
  description: 'The Computational Crystallography Toolbox (cctbx) is being developed

    as the open source component of the Phenix system. The goal of the

    Phenix project is to advance automation of macromolecular structure

    determination. Phenix depends on the cctbx, but not vice versa. This

    hierarchical approach enforces a clean design as a reusable library.

    The cctbx is therefore also useful for small-molecule crystallography

    and even general scientific applications.

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/cctbx/cctbx_project
  doc_url: https://cctbx.github.io/
  home: https://github.com/cctbx/cctbx_project
  license: BSD-3-Clause-LBNL AND BSD-3-Clause AND BSL-1.0 AND LGPL-2.0-only AND LGPL-2.1-only
    AND LGPL-3.0-only AND MIT AND LGPL-2.0-or-later WITH WxWindows-exception-3.1
  license_family: Other
  license_file:

    - ./licenses/LICENSE.txt
    - ./licenses/bsd_3_clause.txt
    - ./licenses/gpl-3.0.txt
    - ./licenses/lgpl-2.0.txt
    - ./licenses/lgpl-2.1.txt
    - ./licenses/lgpl-3.0.txt
    - ./licenses/mit.txt
    - ./licenses/wxWindows_3.1.txt
  summary: The Computational Crystallography Toolbox
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:

    - phyy-nx
